dct_alternative_sm: Three inch Calcutta & Howrah guide map
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading and spot heights.
Insets: Index to districts, municipalities, & municipal wards -- Index to bus routes, Calcutta & Howrah -- Dalhousie Square & Esplanade.
"1st ed. 1933, tape indicator issue"--Cover of index.
At lower margin: Published under the direction of Colonel H. J. Couchman, D.S.O., M.C., officiating surveyor general of India
At lower left corner: Reg. no. 3412 Dʹ28 (D.O. 1-6ʺ = 1M) 2750.
At lower right corner: Engraved and heliozincographed at the Survery of India Offices, Calcutta.
dct_rights_sm: Image from the Map Collections courtesy Stanford University Libraries. This item is in the public domain. There are no restrictions on use. If you have questions, please contact Branner Earth Sciences Library & Map Collections at brannerlibrary@stanford.edu.
